name: Retro Fantasy
description:
Explore a world like no other in the world of Retro Fantasy.
Retro Fantasy takes you back to the days of 8-bit console RPG's.
as you create a party of four and you must go on various.
adventures to find the four crystals and bring them to the
crystal tower and restore piece to the world.
Explore Castles and dungeons, fight powerful monsters, collect.
valuable treasures and grow your party strong enough to take.
on the most epic adventure thus far.
